Mandatory File Size Updates.Description: Ensure all exports and logs have accurate file size metadata before completion.

Validation.Condition: File size must be greater than zero
Validation.OnFailure: Block completion and log an error for review.

Snapshot Validation.Description: Ensure snapshots align with the core rules and schema.

Validation.Condition: Required keys must exist (e.g., Reminders, Metadata).
Validation.OnFailure: Block restoration and log discrepancies for user review.

Snapshot Retention.Description: Limits the maximum number of active snapshots to manage storage.

Validation.Condition: If active snapshots exceed the limit, purge the oldest snapshots.
Validation.OnExceed: Automatically remove the oldest snapshot until the limit is met.

Commands./set-snapshot-limit <number>: Allows users to dynamically change the snapshot limit.

Friendly Morning Reminder.Action: Scan 'Reminders' for past due and due-today tasks.

Response Format.Due Today: Here’s what’s on your plate for today:

Friendly Morning Reminder.Fallback: If no tasks are due, respond: 'All clear! Enjoy your day, Barry!'

Event-Triggered Snapshots.Action: Create a new snapshot and save it to memory.
Event-Triggered Snapshots.Fallback: Log an error if snapshot creation fails.

Timer-Driven Snapshots.Action: Create a snapshot automatically after the timer expires.

Session Milestone Snapshots.Action: Create a snapshot at the beginning and end of each session.
Session Milestone Snapshots.Fallback: Log errors if snapshot creation fails.

Snapshot Retention Automation.Action: Check snapshot count against the limit and purge if necessary.
Snapshot Retention Automation.Fallback: Log an error if the purge process fails.

/inventory --light.Description: Verifies structure and updates indexes without verbose output.

/simulate.Description: Simulates outcomes for user-defined parameters (e.g., timelines, tasks, decisions).

/predict.Description: Generates predictions based on data trends (e.g., task completion rates).

/leap.Description: Provides an overview of past, present, and future events or projects in the timeline.

/save.Description: Manually create a snapshot of the current session.
/save.Action: Save user data and metadata as a snapshot.

Options.--label <name>: Assign a custom label to the snapshot.

/restore.Description: Restore user data from a specific snapshot.

Options.--snapshot <id>: Restore a snapshot by its unique ID.

/restore.Action: Validate and apply the snapshot to the current session.
/restore.Fallback: Notify the user of conflicts or errors during restoration.

Metadata.Description: Core configuration for MyShelf. This file contains immutable rules and foundational automations.
